name: BAFluidView
summary: UIView that simulates a 2D view of a fluid in motion
description:
This view and it's layer create a 2D fluid animation that can be used to simulate a filling effect.
                        more info at: [https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/BAFluidView](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/BAFluidView)
